dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.

sentences.english: Hang down on ear object the clear lapidary spirit gas like water is threatening.

sentences.english: At night, water vapors in the air turn into small water-drops when it encounters cold temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，当温度冷时，空气中的水汽转化为小小的水滴。

sentences.english: The fog is composed of the water droplets suspending in the air.
sentences.chinese: 雾是由大量悬浮在空气中的小水滴组成。

sentences.english: 33Drops of water fall from a melting iceberg near Nuuk, Greenland, on July 26, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰努克附近，从融化的冰山上流下的水滴。

sentences.english: The special anti water drop design guarantees no condensed water on the top of the steam box.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的防水滴设计，保证蒸箱顶部绝不产生冷凝水滴。

sentences.english: The fluid drop shape gives any outfit a hint of romance. Why not combine it with the matching earrings?
sentences.chinese: 而线条流丽的水滴形坠饰，则为装扮注入浪漫气息。

sentences.english: The droplets immediately flash off to steam, carrying away tremendous amounts of Btus.
sentences.chinese: 水滴立即闪蒸成蒸汽，带走大量的热量。

sentences.english: A long, long time later, two drops of water come out from the glacier.
sentences.chinese: 很久很久之后，两滴水滴从冰川上融化出来。

sentences.english: The ST is water drop shape design , The Seat Post clamp design is special and high feeling.

sentences.english: The silica coating prevents the water droplets fromcombining and turning back into a liquid.

sentences.english: Clouds are made of tiny drops water.
If the roof drops beads, drops deep pool ding-dong sound, it is called "supernatural spring."
sentences.chinese: 洞顶水滴若珠，滴入深池叮咚作响，名曰“灵异泉”。

sentences.english: In its early stages the rain was augmented by the small water droplets still descending from the radioactive cloud .
sentences.chinese: 开始时，从放射性云下沉的小水滴使雨势增大。

sentences.english: Clouds are lots of tiny bits of water that hang together in the air.
sentences.chinese: 云是由许多悬浮在空气中小水滴组成的。

sentences.english: Two B or Not Two B, that is a question .
sentences.chinese: 对呀，六一散是水滴赞助的。怎么勒，出现啥问题了？
